default.welcome: You find yourself in a rather large room, with four walls and a door to the north.
default.name: Default Room
default.desc: Nothing of interest in here, but there's a door to the north.

north_hall.welcome: You step into a rather large hallway... You can see somebody's office to the north.
north_hall.name: North Hall
north_hall.desc: A hallway. The designers clearly paid attention to detail -- the pattern etched into the walls on both sides is exactly the same, down to the millimeter. It's almost scary.
